title: Twitter: Hell or Heaven?
description:
After over a year of being on Twitter, I have found the rumours that the platform is one big dumpster fire to be indeed not true. In this segment I talk about why I think I have a good time of it on the platform. Pls share if you agree or disagree!

Follow me on twitter @AndeaLynnLewis
